overview: Share the spirit of the season as you scare up new and old traditions with Vampirina. Gear up for very merry motoring with Mickey and the Roadster Racers, and join the Puppy Dog Pals as they hitch a Christmas Eve ride on Santa's sleigh. You're in for fun, music, and joyful surprises all rolled into one when you spend the holidays with family, friends...and your best pals from Disney Junior.
title: Disney Junior Holiday
